DataElement.preferredName: Person Measured Serial Pregnancy Weight Gain Weight Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human being._Having been determined by measurement._A unique identifier assigned to a member of a series of similar items._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._Gain; to increase or the amount of increase._The numerical result of the determination of the vertical force exerted by the mass of an individual as a result of gravity.

Concepts.definition: A unique identifier assigned to a member of a series of similar items.
The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.
The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.
Gain; to increase or the amount of increase.
